DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project examine efficacy culturally-based intervention , compare standard agency service , enhance self-care among Native Hawaiian woman decrease IPV/SV perpetration related factor among Native Hawaiian men .
DOC.brief_title: Ke Ala Lokahi Demonstration Project Sexual Domestic Violence Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: Turning Point Families Hilo , Hawaii develop , implementing , evaluate culturally-based intervention use Native Hawaiian value , belief , practice address intimate partner sexual violence among Native Hawaiian perpetrator victims/survivors .
DOC.criteria: Men woman selfidentified Native Hawaiian refer agency service due intimate partner sexual violence See . No exclusion criterion .
